feed.title: Category: introduction | The Blog of Marc Gayle

entry.title: Hello world!
entry.content:
With the economy crumbling around us, the world going crazy, everybody blaming anybody else, this is my way of trying to make sense of it all.

Sometimes there will be links, sometimes there will be analysis, and other times the occassional rant. All the time though, they will either be my thoughts - or on my thoughts.

You can also feel free to follow me on twitter @marcgayle.
